original_text: Moreover, as you Philippians know, in the early days of your acquaintance with the gospel, when I set out from Macedonia, not one church shared with me in the matter of giving and receiving, except you only;
korean_text: 빌립보 사람들아 너희도 알거니와 복음의 시초에 내가 마게도냐를 떠날 때에 주고 받는 내 일에 참여한 교회가 너희 외에 아무도 없었느니라

sentences.korean_translation: 또한, 너희 빌립보 사람들이 아는 바와 같이

sentences.original_text: of your acquaintance with the gospel
when I set out from Macedonia
not one church shared with me
in the matter of giving and receiving
